Agent.description: An entity that can act or be acted upon

id.description: Unique identifier within the schema. Must start with a letter and contain only letters, digits, underscores, hyphens, colons, semicolons, or periods (for DTMI format).

memberOf.description: Indicates membership in an organization. Note that componency (e.g., departments of a corporation) are expressed using the more generic Organization.isPartOf property.

owns.description: Indicates ownership of some thing, e.g., a building, an asset, an organization, etc.

Agent.title: Agent

AggregateEnum.description: Aggregation functions for point data processing
AggregateEnum.title: AggregateEnum

ArchitectureArea.description: Describes business-relevant area measurements typically associated with architected spaces

id.description: Unique identifier within the schema. Must start with a letter and contain only letters, digits, underscores, hyphens, colons, semicolons, or periods (for DTMI format).

ArchitectureArea.title: ArchitectureArea

ArchitectureCapacity.description: Describes business-relevant capacity measurements typically associated with architected spaces

id.description: Unique identifier within the schema. Must start with a letter and contain only letters, digits, underscores, hyphens, colons, semicolons, or periods (for DTMI format).

ArchitectureCapacity.title: ArchitectureCapacity

Building.description: A building which is part of a site.

adjacentElement.description: Building element adjacent to this architecture

architectedBy.description: Agent or resource that architected this structure

constructedBy.description: Agent or resource that constructed this architecture

containsElement.description: Building element contained within this architecture

description.description: A textual description of the resource

geometry.description: Polygon representing the spatial extent of this Space.

georeference.description: A georeference creates a relationship between the local coordinate system used within a building (e.g., measured in meters) and a geographic coordinate system (e.g., lat, long, alt), such that locally placed Spaces can be resolved and rendered in that geographic coordinate system (e.g., for mapping purposes).

hasPart.description: The subject is composed in part of the entity given by the object.

id.description: Unique identifier within the schema. Must start with a letter and contain only letters, digits, underscores, hyphens, colons, semicolons, or periods (for DTMI format).

intersectingElement.description: Building element intersecting with this architecture

isLocationOf.description: Subject is the physical location encapsulating the object.

operatedBy.description: Agent or resource that operates this architecture

ownedBy.description: Agent or resource that owns this architecture

Building.title: Building

BuildingElement.description: A part of the building structure

id.description: Unique identifier within the schema. Must start with a letter and contain only letters, digits, underscores, hyphens, colons, semicolons, or periods (for DTMI format).

BuildingElement.title: BuildingElement

Document.description: A document providing information about a building element or asset

checksum.description: Checksum or hash of the information content

description.description: A textual description of the resource

format.description: MIME type or format identifier for the information

language.description: Language code (ISO 639-1) of the information content

size.description: Size of the information resource in bytes

url.description: URL or URI pointing to the information resource

Document.title: Document

Equipment.description: An equipment asset installed in a space.

commissionedBy.description: Agent or resource that commissioned this asset

commissioningDate.description: Date when the asset was commissioned

description.description: A textual description of the resource

feeds.description: Equipment or system that this equipment feeds

geometry.description: Polygon representing the spatial extent of this Space.

hasPart.description: The subject is composed in part of the entity given by the object.

id.description: Unique identifier within the schema. Must start with a letter and contain only letters, digits, underscores, hyphens, colons, semicolons, or periods (for DTMI format).

installationDate.description: Date when the asset was installed

installedBy.description: Agent or resource that installed this asset

locatedIn.description: Space where this asset is located

manufacturedBy.description: Agent or resource that manufactured this asset

mountedOn.description: Building element on which this asset is mounted

operationalStageCount.description: The number of operational stages supported by this equipment

servicedBy.description: Agent or resource that services this asset

turnoverDate.description: Date when the asset was turned over

Point.description: A sensor, actuator, or data point associated with equipment.

hasQuantity.description: Physical quantity measured by this point

PointExt.description: A point (sensor/actuator) in a smart building context.

aggregate.description: Aggregation function or method for point data processing

hasQuantity.description: Physical quantity measured by this point

id.description: Unique identifier within the schema. Must start with a letter and contain only letters, digits, underscores, hyphens, colons, semicolons, or periods (for DTMI format).

isPointOf.description: Equipment that this point belongs to

pointSpecification.description: Point specification category as shown in equipment point list. English is recommended.

pointType.description: Point type - a profile or template name used to refer to the telemetry format obtainable from the device or point. Specific definitions are provided separately in schema files.

scale.description: Scale factor for raw value conversion

unit.description: Measurement unit (enum key; symbol can be taken from annotations)
